text: Chydaeopsis ruficollis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1922.Biolib.cz - Chydaeopsis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Acanthocinini Category:Beetles described in 1922
title: Chydaeopsis ruficollis
